sense.def:
Caution
je velika skrbnost, s katero se izognemo nevarnosti.

seg.quote: You must proceed with extreme caution.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REPORT VB

sense.def:
Če nekdo
cautions someone
, drugega človeka posvari.

seg.quote: I cautioned him not to reveal too much to anyone.
The doctor cautioned that any such state of tension could be highly dangerous.

sense.def:
Kadar policisti
caution someone
, človeku povedo, da lahko vse, kar bo izjavil, uporabijo kot dokaz na sojenju proti njemu.
